algorithm_understanding.core_principle: Der Algorithmus ist ein Performance-Vergleichsmechanismus mit EINEM Ziel: Watchtime maximieren
key_facts: Du kämpfst gegen ALLE anderen Videos - Algorithmus ist nur Schiedsrichter
Make a video so good that people cannot physically scroll past

paradox_statement.principle: Challenge common belief with cognitive dissonance
paradox_statement.template: Wir machen [UNIVERSELLES] falsch - und zwar dort wo wir [GEGENTEIL] sollten

examples: Nur Frauen haben ein sogenanntes Rieselorgan

everyday_mystery.principle: Reveal hidden truth in harmless habits
examples: Salat aus Spanien wird mit Kot gedüngt

story_conflict.template: Mach NIEMALS [X]. Hier ist die kurze Story warum...
examples: Ärgere niemals... Eine Horde Kinder sitzt am Straßenrand

hook_extraction.when: Natural hook is weak, payoff is strong
hook_extraction.how: Move payoff statement to start, then provide context
hook_extraction.example: Dieter Lange - Lebenslinie hook moved from minute 10 to start

clean_extraction.how: Extract with minimal cuts, preserve natural flow
clean_extraction.example: Chris Surel - Story has natural strong opening

cross_moment_composition.when: Best hook and best content are in different parts
cross_moment_composition.how: Combine hook from moment A with content from moment B
cross_moment_composition.principle: Thematic relevance matters more than proximity

cutting_principles.core: Every word must earn its place
what_to_cut: Obvious statements the viewer already knows

duration_principles.principle: Duration serves content, not arbitrary targets

timing_principles.payoff_timing: Deliver promise before viewer expects it

strong_indicators: Universal pain point (parenting, relationships, health, money)

anti_patterns: Too many ideas in one clip
